dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Ha ha ha ha ha! Oh my god, you cannot be serious right now!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ha ha ha ha ha! Oh my god, you cannot be serious right now!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: What? What's so funny? Are you even reading the same article, like, come on?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What? What's so funny? Are you even reading the same article, like, come on?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Shadow magic and monopolistic sorcery"? This is it! I knew it! They're literally using magic!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Shadow magic and monopolistic sorcery? This is it! I knew it! They're literally using magic!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, no, no, you absolute, uh, genius. It's satire! It's obviously satirical.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, no, no, you absolute, uh, genius. It's satire! It's obviously satirical.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Satire? Are you telling me "binding of merchants' souls" is, like, a joke? That's real!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Satire? Are you telling me binding of merchants' souls is, like, a joke? That's real!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's a metaphor for exclusive contracts, dude! "Er xuan yi" – they're calling out actual business practices, just with, uh, colorful language.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a metaphor for exclusive contracts, dude! Er xuan yi - they're calling out actual business practices, just with, uh, colorful language.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The State Administration for Market Regulation said Thursday in a brief post on its website that its investigating Alibabas alleged practice of er xuan yi, which means forcing merchants to sell exclusively on one website.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: But the "porcelain doll possessed by a mischievous spirit"! How do you, uh, explain that away?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But the porcelain doll possessed by a mischievous spirit! How do you, uh, explain that away?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's an absurd image to highlight the opacity of their communications! It’s making fun of it!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's an absurd image to highlight the opacity of their communications! It's making fun of it!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, it just shows the ancient powers at play, the, uh, immortal Dragon Emperor.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, it just shows the ancient powers at play, the, uh, immortal Dragon Emperor.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The Dragon Emperor is a stand-in for the government, Host_A! The real government!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Dragon Emperor is a stand-in for the government, Host_A! The real government!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So the "fabric of reality itself momentarily unraveling" when the shares plunged? That's just, what, stock market fluctuations to you?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So the fabric of reality itself momentarily unraveling when the shares plunged? That's just, what, stock market fluctuations to you?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's hyperbole for an 80% stock drop! Seriously, how can you not see this?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's hyperbole for an eighty percent stock drop! Seriously, how can you not see this?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Shares of Chinese e-commerce giant Alibaba plunged almost 8% in Hong Kong in the immediate aftermath of the announcement.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Jack Ma's "hubris" and the "wrath of the Jade Emperor"! You think that's, um, just, like, a bad quarterly report?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Jack Ma's hubris and the wrath of the Jade Emperor! You think that's, um, just, like, a bad quarterly report?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He criticized the regulators, Host_A! That's the "wrath"! It's not, uh, literal gods!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He criticized the regulators, Host_A! That's the wrath! It's not, uh, literal gods!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And Ant Group facing "trials of fire and brimstone"? A "celestial earthquake" scuttling the IPO?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Ant Group facing trials of fire and brimstone? A celestial earthquake scuttling the I P O?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It was a regulatory crackdown! They pulled the IPO! It was never, like, a real earthquake!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It was a regulatory crackdown! They pulled the I P O! It was never, like, a real earthquake!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The companys $35 billion initial public offering, which would have been the worlds largest, was scuttled in early November amid sudden changes in the regulatory environment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You're just ignoring the evidence! The ancient prophecies! This is, uh, literally happening!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You're just ignoring the evidence! The ancient prophecies! This is, uh, literally happening!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's a brilliant piece of, like, satirical commentary on real events, and you're taking it as a documentary!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a brilliant piece of, like, satirical commentary on real events, and you're taking it as a documentary!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You just don't want to believe in the, uh, mystical, uh, underpinnings of global finance!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You just don't want to believe in the, uh, mystical, uh, underpinnings of global finance!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I just want to believe in reading comprehension, okay? This is a parody!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I just want to believe in reading comprehension, okay? This is a parody!
